title: The Queen of the Swords
description: A BALANCE DESTROYEDThe realm of Chaos was cast into disorder, for the Vadhagh Prince Corum - last of his ancient race - had slain the Knight of the Swords. Thus the dreaded Queen turned upon Corum, and Mankind began its bloody march across the Earth. All that was gracious and beautiful stood in peril. And so Corum set out upon his fateful odyssey...Cover Illustration: Robert Gould
author: Michael Moorcock
